attributes.action: We the undersigned petition The Prime Minister to clarify the law regarding reasonable force, when defending ones property from intruders and to place greater emphasis on the rights of occupants to protect themselves, their families and property.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On Friday 13th March, 2009, Omari Roberts returned home to find that 2 burglars had forced entry and were in the process of ransacking his mother’s home. During the ensuing confrontation, one of the burglars was injured and the other received a fatal wound.

Omari Roberts was charged with section 18 (wounding with intent) and murder of the other burglar. 

We also urge the public to support Omari Roberts with The Safe as Houses campaign for the charges to be dropped.
